title: Cant play fullscreen
body:
Last night i went to play ranked and after the game started it said screen resolution out of range,i couldnt play,tried everything to fix it it didnt work,and now i got a ban for 5 round 10 mins,after a couple of hours i saw how to fix it and i did,any chance i could get this ban removed? :/

sry for bad english..

replies.body:
Happened to me as well.

"Alt+Enter" did not work.

Now I have a "Leaverbuster" report, and will not play again until Riot announces the issue is fixed.

How can I get the "Leaverbuster Mark" off my account?

If alt+enter is not working for you then go to the Riot Games folder > League of Legends > Config >  game

In that file, under the general section at the top, change windowmode=0 to windowmode=1

We're looking into an issue after this recent patch where some players are seeing screen issues upon loading.  Bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay up to date on this, though we do have a workaround in the meantime!  Try pressing Alt + Enter if you're on full screen to restore your game.  Let me know if that fixes it for you!
Let God give u the biggest love in the world . Thank You !!! IT worked . Now i can play ( P.S i had the same problem )
